body_html:
I don't know enough to have an opinion, but when in doubt kill. We can alway resurrect in a 2.x build while maintaining backwards compatibility if we're wrong. The reverse is not true.
…

body:
I don't know enough to have an opinion, but when in doubt kill. We can
alway resurrect in a 2.x build while maintaining backwards compatibility if
we're wrong. The reverse is not true.
